abstract: Artist John O'Donnell's installation at New Britain Museum of American Art focuses on daily life in a fantastical and hallucinatory kitchen (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: In an exhibition at the New Britain Museum of American Art, John O’Donnell, a multidisciplinary artist, has transformed a small space into a fantastical kitchen.
snippet: In an exhibition at the New Britain Museum of American Art, John O’Donnell, a multidisciplinary artist, has transformed a small space into a fantastical kitchen.

keywords.value: New Britain Museum of American Art

headline.main: Domestic Discombobulation in an Odd Kitchen
headline.seo: ‘New Media: John O’Donnell: Psychedelic Pantry’ at the New Britain Museum of American Art
